description: Provides a high-level view of your AWS Systems.

panels.description: Visualizes AWS usage costs by Global-DataScanned-Bytes across different regions to help optimize spending.
panels.title: 🙂Cost Explorer: Global-DataScanned-Bytes💎

panels.description: Monitors and displays the utilization of Global-DataScanned-Bytes, helping manage costs effectively.
panels.title: Total (Always Free)

panels.description: Monitors AWS Free Tier usage to ensure service limits are not exceeded.
panels.title: 🙂Free Tier🗽

panels.description: Monitors the structure and status of AWS organization accounts and their association within organizational units.

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "AccountsRoot"="Accounts"
| project "Accounts Root: Number"="AccountsRoot.Name"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "AccountsRoot"="Accounts"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "AccountsL1"="OUsL1.Accounts"
| project "Accounts Level 1: Number"="AccountsL1.Name"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "AccountsRoot"="Accounts"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "AccountsL1"="OUsL1.Accounts"
| mv-expand "OUsL2"="OUsL1.OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "AccountsL2"="OUsL2.Accounts"
| project "Accounts Level 2: Number"="AccountsL2.Name"

panels.title: 🔴Organizations: Stats🛸

targets.uql:
parse-json
| mv-expand "NumberOfServicesAccessible"
| project "Services Accessible Number :"="NumberOfServicesAccessible"

parse-json
| mv-expand "NumberOfServicesNotAccessed"
| project "Services Not Accessed Number :"="NumberOfServicesNotAccessed"

panels.description: Displays a hierarchical view of AWS Organizational Units (OUs) and their policies, monitoring configuration status across multiple levels.

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "PolicyTypesRoot"="PolicyTypes"
| project "🆔Org ID: Root"="Id", "OU Name: Root"="Name", "📄Policy Type"="PolicyTypesRoot.Type", "Policy Status"="PolicyTypesRoot.Status"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| project "🆔Org ID: Root"="Id", "OU Name: Root"="Name", "🆔OU ID: Level 1"="OUsL1.Id", "OU Name: Level 1"="OUsL1.Name"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "OUsL2"="OUsL1.OrganizationalUnits"
| project "🆔Org ID: Root"="Id", "OU Name: Root"="Name", "🆔OU ID: Level 1"="OUsL1.Id", "OU Name: Level 1"="OUsL1.Name", "🆔OU ID: Level 2"="OUsL2.Id", "OU Name: Level 2"="OUsL2.Name"

panels.title: 🔴Organizations: OUs🤍

panels.description: Displays AWS organizational account details, including ID, name, email, status, and hierarchy, to manage configuration comprehensively.

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "AccountsRoot"="Accounts"
| project "👤Account ID: Root"="AccountsRoot.Id", "Account Name: Root"="AccountsRoot.Name", "📧Account Email: Root"="AccountsRoot.Email", "Account Joined Method: Root"="AccountsRoot.JoinedMethod", "Account Status: Root"="AccountsRoot.Status", "Account Joined Timestamp: Root"="AccountsRoot.JoinedTimestamp"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "AccountsL1"="OUsL1.Accounts"
| project "🆔OU ID: Level 1"="OUsL1.Id", "OU Name: Level 1"="OUsL1.Name", "👤Account ID: Level 1"="AccountsL1.Id", "Account Name: Level 1"="AccountsL1.Name", "📧Account Email: Level 1"="AccountsL1.Email", "Account Joined Method: Level 1"="AccountsL1.JoinedMethod", "Account Status: Level 1"="AccountsL1.Status", "Account Joined Timestamp: Level 1"="AccountsL1.JoinedTimestamp"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "OUsL2"="OUsL1.OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "AccountsL2"="OUsL2.Accounts"
| project "🆔OU ID: Level 2"="OUsL2.Id", "OU Name: Level 2"="OUsL2.Name", "👤Account ID: Level 2"="AccountsL2.Id", "Account Name: Level 2"="AccountsL2.Name", "📧Account Email: Level 2"="AccountsL2.Email", "Account Joined Method: Level 2"="AccountsL2.JoinedMethod", "Account Status: Level 2"="AccountsL2.Status", "Account Joined Timestamp: Level 2"="AccountsL2.JoinedTimestamp"

panels.title: 🔴Organizations: Accounts📜

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "ServiceControlPolicies"
| mv-expand "PolicyTargets"="Targets"
| project "📄Policy Type"="PolicySummary.Type", "👥Target Type"="PolicyTargets.Type", "👤Target ID"="PolicyTargets.TargetId", "👤Target Name"="PolicyTargets.Name", "Policy ID"="PolicySummary.Id", "📄Policy Name"="PolicySummary.Name", "👀Details"="Content", "Policy Desc"="PolicySummary.Description", "AWS Managed"="PolicySummary.AwsManaged", "Policy ARN"="PolicySummary.Arn"

parse-json
| scope "AccessDetails"
| extend "OUs"=split("EntityPath",'/')
| project "Total Authenticated Entities"="TotalAuthenticatedEntities", "🌐Region"="Region", "Org ID"="OUs[0]", "🆔Org ID: Root"="OUs[1]", "🆔OU ID: Parent"="OUs[2]", "👤Account ID"="OUs[3]", "Service Name"="ServiceName"

matcher.options: Total Workforce Users Total Workforce Users

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "identity_center"
| mv-expand "Workforce"="Users"
#| summarize "Total Workforce Users"=count("Workforce.DisplayName") by "Workforce"
| project ":"="Workforce.DisplayName"
#| count

parse-json
| scope "identity_center"
| mv-expand "Workforce"="Users"
| mv-expand "WorkforceAccAssignments"="Workforce.AccountAssignments"
#| summarize "Total Workforce Users"=count("Workforce.DisplayName") by "Workforce"
| project ":"="WorkforceAccAssignments"
#| count

parse-json
| scope "PermissionSets"
| project ":"="Name"

parse-json
| scope "PermissionSets"
| project ":"="PermissionsBoundary.CustomerManagedPolicyReference.Name"

parse-json
| scope "identity_center"
| project "Instance Name"="Name", "IDP Store ID"="IdentityStoreId", "👤Owner Account ID"="OwnerAccountId", "Status", "Created Date"="CreatedDate", "Instance Arn"="InstanceArn"

parse-json
| scope "identity_center"
| project "Instance Name"="Name", "IDP Store ID"="IdentityStoreId", "Owner Account ID"="OwnerAccountId", "Status", "Created Date"="CreatedDate", "Instance Arn"="InstanceArn"

parse-json
| scope "identity_center"
| mv-expand "Workforce"="Users"
| mv-expand "WorkforceAccAssignments"="Workforce.AccountAssignments"
| mv-expand "WorkforceAccAEmails"="Workforce.Emails"
| mv-expand "WorkforceAccJoinedGroup"="Workforce.JoinedGroup"
#| mv-expand "WorkforceAccName"="Workforce.Name.FamilyName"
#| mv-expand "WorkforceAccPermissionSet"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PermissionSet"
| project "👤Display Name"="Workforce.DisplayName", "IDP Store ID"="Workforce.IdentityStoreId", "👤Workforce Name"="Workforce.UserName", "📧Email"="WorkforceAccAEmails.Value", "Workforce ID"="Workforce.UserId", "👥Group Name"="WorkforceAccJoinedGroup.DisplayName", "Group Desc"="WorkforceAccJoinedGroup.Description", "Group ID"="WorkforceAccJoinedGroup.GroupId", "👤Assigned Account ID"="WorkforceAccAssignments.AccountId", "Assigned Type"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PrincipalType", "Assigned Principal ID"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PrincipalId", "📄PermSet Name"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PermissionSet.Name", "⏳PermSet SessionDuration"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PermissionSet.SessionDuration", "PermSet ARN"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PermissionSet.PermissionSetArn"

parse-json
| scope "PermissionSets"
| mv-expand "MgmtPolicies"="AttachedManagedPolicies"
| mv-expand "CustPolicies"="CustomerManagedPolicyReferences"
| mv-expand "InlinePolicies"="InlinePolicy"
| project "📄PermSet Name"="Name", "⏳Session Duration"="SessionDuration", "📄Mgmt Policy"="MgmtPolicies.Name", "Mgmt Policy ARN"="MgmtPolicies.Arn", "📄Customer Policy"="CustPolicies.Name", "📄Inline Policies"="InlinePolicies", "🔓Permissions Boundary"="PermissionsBoundary.CustomerManagedPolicyReference.Name", "Created Date"="CreatedDate", "PermSet Arn"="PermissionSetArn"

panels.description: IAM Settings such as User, Group, Roles and Policy

targets.uql:
parse-json
| mv-expand "RoleDetails"="RoleDetailList"
| project "Total Roles :"="RoleDetails.RoleName"

parse-json
| mv-expand "RoleDetails"="RoleDetailList"
| project "Total Boundaries :"="RoleDetails.PermissionsBoundary"

panels.title: 🔴IAM: Stats

panels.description: IAM Settings such as User, Group, Roles and Policy
panels.title: 🔴IAM: Role🌈

panels.description: IAM Settings such as User, Group, Roles and Policy
panels.title: 🔴IAM: Customer Managed Policies🦄

panels.description: IAM Settings such as User, Group, Roles and Policy
panels.title: 🔴IAM: Users🍭

targets.expression:
filter eventSource in ["organizations.amazonaws.com", "sso.amazonaws.com", "signin.amazonaws.com", "iam.amazonaws.com", "access-analyzer.amazonaws.com"]
| fields @timestamp, @logStream, @message, eventVersion, userIdentity.type, coalesce(userIdentity.invokedBy, userIdentity.principalId, userIdentity.accountId) as InvokedBy, eventTime, eventSource, eventName, eventType, awsRegion, sourceIPAddress, userAgent, errorCode, errorMessage, eventID, @requestParameters, additionalEventData, requestID, readOnly, eventType, apiVersion, managementEvent, recipientAccountId, recipientAccountId.serviceEventDetails.serviceAccountId, eventCategory, tlsDetails.tlsVersion, tlsDetails.cipherSuite, tlsDetails.clientProvidedHostHeader
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 50

title: 🚀AWS Configuration Management
